sqlMap.statement: SELECT SO.TRX_HDR_NUM ,SO.SO_NUM ,SO.RDD_DT ,RW.RTL_WH_CD ,RW.RTL_WH_NM FROM SHPG_ORD SO ,RTL_WH RW WHERE SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SO.SCHD_COORD_PSN_CD IS NULL AND SO.SCHD_DELY_DT IS NULL AND SO.SCE_ORD_TP_CD = #sceOrdTpRS# AND SO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RW.RTL_WH_CD = SO.WH_CD AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SO.WH_CD ,SO.SO_NUM
